id.description: The id is expressed using camelcase. Dashes (-) and underscores (_) will be converted to camelcase. By default, if the url of this file is foo://bar/baz/<extension>/<extension>.manifest.json, id is <extension>.

label.description: A short label, used in menus etc. By default, label is the <id> with the camel case expanded to add spaces, and the initial letter capitalized.

description.description: A longer description, which can be markdown, used to describe the extension. By default, empty.

path.description: The path (as an HTML5 route) that is used to access this extension. By default, the id, with the camelcase replaced by dashes and lowercase letters.

icon.description: URL of an png file to use for this extension (16 x 16) as an icon. By default, the Fabric8 icon is used. If a file <extension>/<extension>.icon16.png exists, it will be used.

moduleFile.description: The relative path of the extension module file. By default, the file <extension>/<extension>.module.ts#<Extension> is used (where <Extension> is the id with the first letter capitalized).
